title: Facebook Fears Will Pass
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: The hundreds of billions of dollars that Facebook lost overnight will probably be bid back up, as investors come to terms with the reality that the social media giant’s business model remains intact. The matter is not unlike tobacco companies able to increase cigarette usage per customer before the damage cigarettes could cause became widely understood. Learn more about your ad choices.
